title: Replace 'Tropical' zone value with '40' in BirdDataTable

requirements.summary: Update the Zone (المنطقة) column in BirdDataTable.tsx to display '40' instead of 'Tropical' in both read-only and editable modes
acceptanceCriteria: Any cell in the 'Zone' (المنطقة) column that previously displayed 'Tropical' now displays '40'.
The substitution applies to read-only display cells in normal table view.
The substitution applies to the editable input fields when a row is in inline-edit mode.
No other column, row, styling, layout, or functionality of BirdDataTable.tsx is changed.
No other file, component, page, route, or backend file is modified.

file_operations.description: Update the Zone (المنطقة) column rendering logic to replace the string 'Tropical' with '40' in both display and edit modes. This involves modifying the column definition for the Zone field to include a conditional display transformation: when the raw zone value equals 'Tropical', render '40' instead. Ensure this transformation applies to both the read-only table cells and the inline-edit input field values. Do not modify any other column definitions, table layout, RTL orientation, color scheme, admin guards, data-fetching logic, or any other aspect of the component.
